name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. James CLARK, Appellant

judges: Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson and zappala, jj.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. James CLARK, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order of the Superior Court, 280 Pa.Super. 1, 421 A.2d 374, affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John W. Packel, Chief, Appeals Div., Leonard Sosnou, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Gaele McLaughlin Barthold, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
461 A.2d 794
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. James CLARK, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted April 25, 1983.
Decided July 1, 1983.
John W. Packel, Chief, Appeals Div., Leonard Sosnou, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Gaele McLaughlin Barthold, for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson and zappala, jj.
